headline: How Recent Shifts in AI and Demand Are Rewriting the Story for Cognizant
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions has seen a modest lift in its fair value estimate to about $85.22 from roughly $84.70, alongside a marginally lower discount rate of around 9.01% that points to a slightly reduced risk profile in its valuation. These incremental shifts reflect Street views that improving execution, a healthier demand backdrop, and a more coherent AI strategy are gradually strengthening confidence in the company’s medium term outlook. Read on to see how you can monitor these...
